segments.text: Good morning , madam . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy some cleansing milk . What would you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your complexion is on the oily side . I suggest you use cleansing gel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything that can keep my skin clean will do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you prefer this one ? It cleans thoroughly without striping your natural protective oil . The gentle formula keeps skin soft and healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hm ... the smell is too strong , I can't stand it . I'm very sensitive to fragrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We've also got a fragrance-free one , specially designed for sensitive skin . I'm sure you'll like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll try that . Do you have facial cream to go with that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sure . This line of products is fragrance-free . We have a facial mask , moisturizing lotion , eye cream and tonic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll buy the moisturizing lotion and cleansing gel first . If they suit me , I'll come back for the others later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much , madam . Here are some samples of our products . Do try them out .
segments.speaker: S1
